name: slide_imaging
description: These templates are intended to suppor the collection of metadata related to imaging and score of histopathology data. Terms are based on the recommended Recommended Metadata for Biological Images (REMBI) described by Sarkans et al. (2021) <Sarkans, U., Chiu, W., Collinson, L. et al. REMBI: Recommended Metadata for Biological Images—enabling reuse of microscopy data in biology. Nat Methods 18, 1418–1422 (2021). https://doi.org/10.1038/s41592-021-01166-8>

WhitespaceMinimizedString.name: WhitespaceMinimizedString
WhitespaceMinimizedString.description: A string that has all whitespace trimmed off of beginning and end, and all internal whitespace segments reduced to single spaces. Whitespace includes #x9 (tab), #xA (linefeed), and #xD (carriage return).

Provenance.name: Provenance
Provenance.description: A field containing a DataHarmonizer versioning marker. It is issued by DataHarmonizer when validation is applied to a given row of data.

float.name: float
float.description: A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification

double.name: double
double.description: A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification

decimal.name: decimal
decimal.description: A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal specification

time.name: time
time.description: A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular day
notes: URI is dateTime because OWL reasoners do not work with straight date or time

date.name: date
date.description: a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar
notes: URI is dateTime because OWL reasoners don't work with straight date or time

datetime.name: datetime
datetime.description: The combination of a date and time

date_or_datetime.name: date_or_datetime
date_or_datetime.description: Either a date or a datetime

curie.name: curie
comments: in RDF serializations this MUST be expanded to a URI
in non-RDF serializations MAY be serialized as the compact representation

uri.name: uri
comments: in RDF serializations a slot with range of uri is treated as a literal or type xsd:anyURI unless it is an identifier or a reference to an identifier, in which case it is translated directly to a node

objectidentifier.name: objectidentifier
objectidentifier.description: A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model.
comments: Used for inheritence and type checking

nodeidentifier.name: nodeidentifier
nodeidentifier.description: A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model.

submitter_id.name: submitter_id
submitter_id.description: An individual identifier for each slide record.
submitter_id.title: submitter_id

aliquots.submitter_id.name: aliquots.submitter_id
aliquots.submitter_id.description: The identifier from the aliquots table for which the data represents
aliquots.submitter_id.title: aliquots.submitter_id

file_name.name: file_name
file_name.description: The name (or part of a name) of a file (of any type).
file_name.title: file_name

data_category.name: data_category
data_category.description: Broad categorization of the contents of the data file.
data_category.title: data_category

instrument.submitter_id.name: instrument.submitter_id
instrument.submitter_id.description: Specific content type of the data file.
instrument.submitter_id.title: instrument.submitter_id

magnification.name: magnification
magnification.description: The amount or degree of visual enlargement used during image acquisition.
magnification.title: magnification

topography_type.name: topography_type
topography_type.description: Region of the organ where the pathological changes were found.
topography_type.title: topography_type

spontaneous_flag.name: spontaneous_flag
spontaneous_flag.description: The flag shows whether the lesion occurred spontaneously. The flag value is "1" if the lesion occurred spontaneously.
spontaneous_flag.title: spontaneous_flag
